name: Hotel Cubo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in July 2012 and the hotel was great. The room was clean, the decor was modern but comfortable, and the bathroom was large. The service was fantastic. The breakfast was also way beyond my expectations with a lot of healthy options (as well as decadent options). The hotel is just a few minutes walk to the river shops and sites. When I went there wasn't a fitness facility in the hotel, but there is an absolutely beautiful park, Tivoli Park, just a few minutes from the hotel where you can walk or jog - and I highly recommend it! I've been a runner for 15 years and the wooded park trails were so beautiful that it is definitely in my top 3 best runs ever.
reviews.title: Great room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband, adult son and I spent 4 great days at the hotel Cubo. The hotel is modern, comfortable and extremely well located, within walking distance to the old town, shopping and restaurants. The staff is friendly and very helpful. They provided us with excellent dinner and tour recommendations. The food at the hotel is excellent. In fact the dinner we had at the hotel in our last night was one of the best dinners we had in Ljubljana. The only suggestion we'd like to offer the hotel is to dim the lights in the restaurant at dinner time to give it more ambience. We had a great stay at hotel Cubo and highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Great Stay at Hotel Cubo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Without a doubt the best service, dining and overall hotel experience I have ever encountered. Nothing was too much trouble, from check-in and being shown to our room to eating in one of the best restaurants in Ljubljana, this hotel has it all and gives it's all to make your stay a pleasure. The manager even took us in his own car to a doctor's appointment and picked us up afterward. Then he found us a place in their restaurant for dinner even though they were full. It doesn't get any better !!
reviews.title: the best hotel experience in Europe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As so many other reviews have reported, this is a top class hotel. We stayed here for two nights just before Christmas, and would have been very happy to have stayed longer!
reviews.title: Very classy, exclusive hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The position is ideal, on the edge of the old town, just minutes walk from the river. We stayed in a suite on the top floor - with a view of the castle. The room was really spacious and tastefully furnished. The big, round bed was comfortable and the bathroom was impressive. The extras, such as the complimentary mini-bar, fruit and other comforts were appreciated.
reviews.title: best customer service ever experienced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013
reviews.text: Nothing was a problem for this hotel. Everything was excellent and we could not have asked for anything else.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel

reviews.title: Clean, Modern with Excellent Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Keep up the good works one of the best rooms we have had all over Europe. The staff could not have been friendlier and nothing was an issue for them.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An excellent hotel – modern but strange airconditioning which seemed to turn off once it had reached the set temperature and wouldn’t restart. We didn’t ask the staff about it as it wasn't a big deal as temperatures were reasonable during our stay.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Excellent breakfast, including pancakes, omelettes , etc made to order.
reviews.title: Hotel Cubo excedes all expectations!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I was in Ljubljana for 4 nights for some work and a bit of leisure. The city itself is relatively small, so most of the better hotels are quite accessible and well located. The Cubo is no exception. Located about 5 to 7 minutes walking distance from the main city square and the old town. Upon entering, the lobby seems unimpressive and functional. However, the receptionists are all excellent and very helpful and friendly. Liza, Sasa, and Luka who take turns to man the reception are well trained and very competent.
reviews.title: Modern, understated and well run hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I booked a junior suite. It was spacious and modern minimalist in decor. If anything. I would suggest that the management adds a few more pieces of furniture such as arm chairs. There was only one chair in the room!
reviews.title: Great boutique hotel with designer rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other than the lack of furniture, the rest of the room was well designed. Comfortable and firm (very important) beds and windows which seem to mask out the sounds from the street. The bathroom was sufficiently spacious, though the shower area was not designed well enough - the water kept seeping out of the shower area.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was generally good and sufficient.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: Exceeded all expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Located in a great location, Hotel Cubo is everything you would want in a hotel. The hotel is stylish and very modern, which helps. The beds are very comfortable, huge bathroom. But the two most amazing elements of the hotel is service. Upon arriving the receptionist was very welcoming and providing a wealth of information. During my entire stay everyone at the hotel was very helpful and provided lots of information. The second element was the food! Although the kitchen wasn't open on Sunday, the breakfast was delicious. Amazing jam the kind you just want to eat with a spoon, coffee was great. I also had a lunch and my risotto was sublime, not only that but my waiter was very attentive, the final was a chocolate fondant which was too die for. I would stay at Hotel Cubo again and its what I love about these smaller more bespoke hotels.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Reading the reviews, I can only confirm it is an excellent hotel. Small touches, like a free minibar and more TV channels than you can ever watch, mean a lot to a guest and cost little to provide. Other hotels see this a revenue - and miss the point. My small double room is excellent (everything you could need) and the location is ideal for the old town.
reviews.title: Nothing new to add...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was lovely. Very contemporary but still comfortable. Lovely spacious rooms, large walk in shower, comfortable bed, huge TV, staff were very friendly and helpful. Nice breakfast with extensive selection.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Hotel Cubo is very close to the old town so you can easily walk to shops and restaurants. Main rail & bus station is less than 2kms away, and its an easy flat walk - but if you have large bags I would catch a cab.
reviews.title: Latest and the best hotel in Ljubljana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Overall this was a great hotel and we would recommend.
reviews.title: Top shelf.......

description: The word Cubo stands for originality, setting new standards and a cosmopolitan atmosphere. Contemporary design, exclusive materials and central location is what you'll experience with Cubo Hotel!
